name: Portal Arena
description:
The goblins have been conspiring in secret for years. To take over the lands of the vikings. Their legions are on the way. And it's up to you to protect the rich vikings heritage from these invaders. But beware, for the golems are sneaky. They have found a way to use portals!

The game was made for Mini Jam 111. In 72 hours.

BorTink - Composer

PapaCashew - Developer

r3disback - 3D Designer

zhuruisy - Developer

Nynos - Graphic Designer
